periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Patchy Fog
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7pm, then patchy fog. Mostly cloudy. Low around 69, with temperatures rising to around 71 overnight. Southeast wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.
